column4: is ubuntu 10.10 maverick not 'production' ? at least for servers? i have to run do-release-upgrade -d to make my box think maverick is okay
You need to modify /etc/update-manager/release-upgrades to 'normal' from 'lts' in order for do-release-upgrade to suggest the upgrade.
Look at the contents of that file and you'll understand, it has a big commented explanation at the top.
